AVP derive large precursor peptide along copeptin , stable peptide directly mirror production AVP . Copeptin assay readily plasma . Aim : To evaluate diagnostic accuracy copeptin level diagnosis differential diagnosis diabetes insipidus . Design : Prospective , observational multicenter study . Setting : Department Endocrinology , University Hospital Basel Patients : Patients suspect known central ( complete partial ) , nephrogenic ( complete partial ) psychogenic diabetes insipidus undergo standardized water deprivation test . Intervention : All patient suspect know diabetes insipidus undergo overnight water deprivation test standardize water deprivation test , routinely perform diagnostic evaluation diabetes insipidus . Plasma AVP copeptin measure baseline ( 8 start thirst ) , hourly water deprivation test . Study hypothesis : Copeptin level provide well diagnostic accuracy diagnosis differential diagnosis diabetes insipidus compare AVP measurement . Analysis : We study 5 group patient : A ) Patients complete central diabetes insipidus , B ) Patients partial central diabetes insipidus , C ) Patients complete nephrogenic diabetes insipidus , D ) Patients partial nephrogenic diabetes insipidus E ) Patients psychogenic diabetes insipidus . All group consist 10 patient base following assumption : Based pilot study assume patient group A ) copeptin value 2.5 ± 1.0 ; Group B ) 3.0 ± 1.0 , Group C ) 15.0 ± 5 ; Group D ) 6 ± 2.0 Group E ) 4.0 ± 1.0 pmol/L .
